properties.name: org.jobrunr.database.datasource.url
properties.description: The datasource url jobRunr uses.

properties.name: org.jobrunr.database.datasource.driver-class-name
properties.description: The datasource driver class for jobRunrs datasource.

properties.description: The username jobRunr uses for the datasource.

properties.name: org.jobrunr.database.datasource.password
properties.description: The password jobRunr uses for the datasource.

properties.name: qbic.access-token.salt
properties.description: The salt used to encrypt personal access tokens. A hex representation of the bytes.

properties.name: qbic.access-token.iteration-count
properties.description: The number of iterations used in personal access token encryption.

properties.name: server.download.api.measurement.url
properties.description: URL of the server from which to download the raw data from.

properties.description: URL of the openbis application server containing the measurement information

properties.description: URL of the openbis datastore server containing the measurement information
